document.full_text: a lawsuit on thursday charged former budweiser beer executive august busch iv with negligence in the fatal drug overdose of his girlfriend in december, the lawyer for the woman's family said.
document.title: brewing heir busch sued over death of his girlfriend
lines_and_colors: a lawsuit on thursday charged former budweiser beer executive august busch iv with negligence in the fatal drug overdose of his girlfriend in december, the lawyer for the woman's family said.
